## block() function

Annotations provides a short and easy way to inject code.

The following:

@<!-- -->block("employee") private emp:Block;

Will create and inject a block into the variable emp

**Signature:**

```typescript
block: (block: string) => (form: Form, attr: string) => void
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | string |  |

**Returns:**

(form: [Form](./forms42core.form.md)<!-- -->, attr: string) =&gt; void
